spawnpoint.name: Spawnpoint
spawnpoint.text: You arrive at the world spawnpoint. To the north, you see a small town area. To the south, you see a snowy area to which a trail of small, tri-pointed tracks lead. To the west, you see a soaring cliff flocked by pigeons.

tundra.name: Tundra
tundra.text: You walk to the precipice of the snow. The change in temperature is immediate and unnatural, you know you can't pass without some form of higher insulation. Farther to the south, sat in the middle of the snow is an odd building surrounded by unidenifiable figures. Back to the north, you can see the spawnpoint.

cliffside.name: Cliffside
cliffside.text: You walk to the bottom of the cliff. It soars higher now than you could have noticed before; easily over a hundred feet up. The pigeons look at you tauntingly, but you know you will require more than your bare hands to scale the cliff. Farther to the west, on top of the cliff, you see a strange building. Back to the east, you can see the spawnpoint.
